attributes.action: A full scale UK wide public inquiry into the rape of our children.
attributes.additional_details: The government and authorities continually complain about mysgonistic issues yet they don't resolve the biggest issue this country has the protection of our children especially the vulnerable girls. Therefore a full UK inquiry to resolve this issue once and for all. No shirking their responsibilities drive to the root of the issue be it the perpetrators or the people who turned a blind eye or complicit to this cover up.
attributes.background: I want our public servants to get off the fence and start a full scale inquiry to the decades old issue of our children being raped by grooming gangs/men and once and for all bring all perpetrators to justice, including people in positions ignoring these victims.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
